OpenLayers 4 R Preface OpenLayers 4 R is easy to install And fun to use

OpenLayers 4 R Stefan Kuethe Preface OpenLayers 4 R is easy to install require("devtools") install_github("crazycapivara/openlayers") And fun to use require("geojsonio") ol() %>% add_stamen_tiles() %>% add_features(us_cities) %>% add_drag_and_drop()
